\begin{figure}
	\centering 
% https://q.uiver.app/?
\begin{subfigure}[b]{0.5\textwidth}
\begin{tikzcd}%
	{a_1} && {a_2} && {a_1} && {a_2} \\
	{i_1} && {i_2} && {i_1} && {i_2}
	\arrow["R"{description}, from=2-1, to=1-1]
	\arrow[""{name=0, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "R"{description}, from=2-5, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{R(E)}"{description}, Rightarrow, no head, from=2-5, to=2-7]
	\arrow["R"{description}, from=2-7, to=1-7]
	\arrow["E"{description}, Rightarrow, no head, from=1-5, to=1-7]
	\arrow[""{name=1, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, draw=none, from=2-3, to=1-3]
	\arrow["R"{description}, from=2-3, to=1-3]
	\arrow["E"{description}, Rightarrow, no head, from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow[shorten <=19pt, shorten >=19pt, Rightarrow, from=1, to=0]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{subfigure}
\hfill
% https://q.uiver.app/?
\begin{subfigure}[b]{0.5\textwidth}
\begin{tikzcd}%
	&& {} && {a_1} && {a_2} \\
	{i_1} && {i_2} && {i_1} && {i_2}
	\arrow[""{name=0, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "R"{description}, from=2-5, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{R(E)}"{description}, Rightarrow, no head, from=2-5, to=2-7]
	\arrow["R"{description}, from=2-7, to=1-7]
	\arrow["E"{description}, Rightarrow, no head, from=1-5, to=1-7]
	\arrow["{R(E)}"{description}, Rightarrow, no head, from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow[""{name=1, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, draw=none, from=2-3, to=1-3]
	\arrow[shorten <=19pt, shorten >=19pt, Rightarrow, from=1, to=0]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{subfigure}
\caption{Two directions of derived equivalence relation for the implementation from abstraction's equivalence relation E}
\end{figure}
